tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE task_dependencies (
    dependency_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    depends_on_id INT,
    dependent_id INT,
    CONSTRAINT fk_depends_on FOREIGN KEY(depends_on_id) REFERENCES tasks(task_id),
    CONSTRAINT fk_dependent FOREIGN KEY(dependent_id) REFERENCES tasks(task_id)
);

CREATE TABLE assigned_tasks (
    assignment_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    task_id INT,
    assignee VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    deadline DATE,
    CONSTRAINT fk_task FOREIGN KEY(task_id) REFERENCES tasks(task_id)
);

CREATE TABLE task_history (
    history_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    task_id INT,
    execution_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    status VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    remarks VARCHAR(255),
    CONSTRAINT fk_task_history FOREIGN KEY(task_id) REFERENCES tasks(task_id)
);

CREATE TABLE task_dependencies (
 task_id INT,
 dependency_id INT,
 PRIMARY KEY(task_id, dependency_id),
 FOREIGN KEY(task_id) REFERENCES tasks(task_id),
 FOREIGN KEY(dependency_id) REFERENCES dependencies(dependency_id)
);

CREATE TABLE task_logs (
 log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 task_id INT,
 log_message TEXT,
 timestamp TIMESTAMP,
 FOREIGN KEY(task_id) REFERENCES tasks(task_id)
);
